sentences.en: Coughs and sneezes spread infections much faster in a warm atmos-phere.

sentences.en: The industrial revolution, which started a couple of hundred years ago in Europe, is now spreading across the world.

sentences.en: The move follows growing public concern over the spread of the disease.
